overview:
Doron is currently the Head of Sales at Hong Kong based job search engine Recruit.net where he is responsible to direct the sales process, set the monetization strategy as well as to lead new business generation and upselling of existing advertisers.

In 2007 he founded NewChinaCareer to solve a puzzling gap in China’s world of online recruitment and high-end employment. As the Business Development Manager at financial recruiter Matthew Hoyle International in Hong Kong, Doron saw that, while large Chinese job boards worked well for entry and mid-level candidates, high-level job searches for bi-lingual speaking professionals were not being conducted efficiently online.

Prior to co-founding NewChinaCareer and his role current role at Recruit.net, Doron was a Account Manager at NationaleVacaturebank.nl, a Netherlands-based online recruitment startup.
